thread.title: 8 Valentine's Day Gifts You Should Give Yourself This Year
thread.title_full: 8 Valentine's Day Gifts You Should Give Yourself This Year

title: 8 Valentine's Day Gifts You Should Give Yourself This Year
text: facebook Who says being single on Valentine's Day sucks? From where we see it, it means having an entire day dedicated to loving, and pampering yourself without any guilt whatsoever! If you're your own Valentine, that is actually a pretty awesome thing. Mostly because it involves you buying yourself a present (or few), that you know you will love! If you need help trying to figure out what to get yourself this V-Day, here's a list: 1. Wall art that you will cherish for the rest of your life 2. Spa day. Because you know you deserve it! 3. A ring for that finger. Because why should you wait? 4. A bottle of that perfume, which can be smelled from a mile away 5. A subscription box of your favourite thing. A year-long supply of make-up? Yes, please! 6. A makeover 7. A comfortable chair or couch that's ONLY for you to use! 8. A gym or fitness centre membership. Because keeping healthy is the best thing you can do for yourself. Picture Credits: Thinkstock / Getty Images, Pexels
